alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 1:26PM MDT until June 23 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Wayne County in southern Utah... * Until 200 PM MDT * At 126 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southwest of Hanksville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hanksville. This includes the following highways... Utah Route 24 between mile markers 101 and 121. Utah Route 95 between mile markers 0 and 12. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
